channel.title: What files do I offer?
channel.description: Hey, I've created my own server and now I'm opening it for BETA but only via Hamachi, everything is perfectly fine my friend is on but Im unsure of what files i put up for download. What files do i offer to people in order for them to be able to connect? Please Help :)

item.title: What files do I offer?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“thearcticwolf97, post:3, topic:477733”]Yous Should get a JAR maker and jar your client, there are tons of tutorials and it is VERY simple to do and is also very fast, you will distribute that to your players
also why use Hamachi? if you can’t portforward through your router just do it through UTorrent. If interestid in doing that I can tell you how, that is also very simple. hope I helped.[/quote]

I wouldn’t suggest using utorrent. It has many problems. (Don’t say i didn’t warn you)

Read full topic

item.title: What files do I offer?
item.dc:creator: @thearcticwolf97 thearcticwolf97
item.description:
@thearcticwolf97 wrote:

Yous Should get a JAR maker and jar your client, there are tons of tutorials and it is VERY simple to do and is also very fast, you will distribute that to your players
also why use Hamachi? if you can’t portforward through your router just do it through UTorrent. If interestid in doing that I can tell you how, that is also very simple. hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: What files do I offer?
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Just create a jar. There are many guides out there.

http://www.google.com/#hl=en&tbo=d&output=search&sclient=psy-ab&q=how+to+jar+a+rsps&oq=how+to+jar+a+rsps&gs_l=hp.3..0l2j0i22l2.461.5110.0.5202.27.18.6.3.4.1.279.2499.1j14j2.17.0.les%3B..0.0...1c.1.3QZf7jeNYlY&pbx=1&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.r_qf.&bvm=bv.1355534169,d.b2U&fp=c8145b5e7544d182&bpcl=40096503&biw=1708&bih=830
